entry.title: New Director at Umpqua Valley Arts
entry.summary: Monica Stanfield is thriving in her second term in Roseburg. A Detroit, Michigan, native, she previously lived in the area with her family and later returned for personal reasons, securing two jobs that align with her experience, education and passions.…

entry.summary: December 23, 2024 3:50 a.m. A Dense Fog Advisory is in effect through 10:00 a.m. Monday morning for much of southern Oregon. The Advisory includes central Douglas County, Josephine County and eastern Curry County....

entry.title: Umpqua Lighthouse to participate in Oregon State Park's Winter Whale Watch Week
entry.summary: Douglas County lovers of all things oceanic will be given a chance to see some rare sights over the Dec. 27 weekend with Oregon State Park’s Winter Whale Watch Week, a whale-watching event hosted, in part, at the Umpqua Lighthouse.

entry.title: WISH UPON A STAR 12.20.24
entry.summary: Brooke Communication’s and Rogue Credit Union have the final Wish Upon a Star for 2024. Today’s nominees are Justin and Beth.
